## header.tex
```
%% Japanese font
\usepackage{luatexja}
\usepackage[noto-otf,deluxe]{luatexja-preset}
\setmainjfont{NotoSansCJKjp}

%% Title font size
\setbeamerfont{title}{size=\huge}
```
